attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We've been fighting this war for 7 years and we have not progressed in winning or moving forward to securing peace in this messed up country! France & Germany have it right by keeping out. So not only are we sending our forces to this bloody hell hole, we are sending them without the correct equipment to protect them! All we have achieved in 7 years is the massive loss of young lives. Our street's will be the same regardless because the government are breeding these terrorists by being an 'accepting' country and opening its borders to the world and there dogs!!
Is it worth it?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
